text: Serious Business may refer to * Serious Business (album), by Johnny Winter, released in 1985 * "Serious Business", a song from the album Uh-huh by John Cougar Mellencamp and the B-side of "Pink Houses" * Serious Business, one of the earliest game developers on Facebook, acquired by Zynga in 2010 * Serious Business Records, a record label founded by Travis Harrison and Andy Ross == See also == * SIRIUS Business, a commercial background music service of Applied Media Technologies Corporation
title: Serious Business
